DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect alkaline ( pH=9 ) versus neutral ( pH=9 ) drinking-water gut microbiota healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Drinking-Water pH Human Gut Microbiota
DOC.criteria: Male Nonsmoker Age 18 35 year Weight stabile least 2 month BMI 20.0 27.0 kg/m^2 Habitual consumption caloric artificially sweeten beverage excess 1L/week Habitual average consumption alcohol excess 7 drinks/week Antibiotic treatment within two month inclusion Chronic acute illness Previous abdominal surgery
